metadata.title: CVE-2019-14289 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an integer overflow in the function JBIG2Bitmap::combine at JBIG2Stream.cc for the "multiple bytes per line" case.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. mdeslaur> in poppler, this is CVE-2017-9776

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
